resources.string: This app requires some permissions to function properly

The app needs to draw over other apps. The image below shows how you can turn it on. The button below will take you to the settings page. Furthermore, you can find these settings in \nSettings > Apps > Advanced > Draw over other apps

You need to enable the Accessibility service for this app. The image below shows how you can turn it on. The button below will take you to the settings page. Furthermore, you can find these settings in \nSettings > Accessibility > VirtualSoftKeys
"Please allow this permission first, and select VirtualSoftKeys in accessibility"

Turn VirtualSoftKey\'s service on or off, Remember if the service is off you cannot use Soft Key Bar in your app.\n Remember, We care about users privacy and do not collect any data from users, this is an open source project and you can find the URL for the project on the main page.
Move slider to increase\\decrease the height of touch area, touching that area will make the navigation bar visible
If your phone supports stylus, You can select this mode and use stylus to activate the navigation bar
